verses.text: \w Then|strong="G3767"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w six|strong="G1803"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* \w before|strong="G4253"\w* the \w passover|strong="G3957"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Bethany|strong="G0963"\w*, \w where|strong="G3699"\w* \w Lazarus|strong="G2976"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* which had been \w dead|strong="G2348"\w*, \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* he \w raised|strong="G1453"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*.

\w There|strong="G1563"\w* they \w made|strong="G4160"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* a \w supper|strong="G1173"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Martha|strong="G3136"\w* \w served|strong="G1247"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w Lazarus|strong="G2976"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* of them that sat at the \w table|strong="G4873"\w* with \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

Why \w was|strong="G5101"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* \w ointment|strong="G3464"\w* \w sold|strong="G4097"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* three \w hundred|strong="G5145"\w* \w pence|strong="G1220"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w given|strong="G1325"\w* to the \w poor|strong="G4434"\w*?

\w This|strong="G5124"\w* he \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w cared|strong="G3199"\w* \w for|strong="G4012"\w* the \w poor|strong="G4434"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w because|strong="G3754"\w* he \w was|strong="G2258"\w* a \w thief|strong="G2812"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* the \w bag|strong="G1101"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w bare|strong="G0941"\w* what was put \w therein|strong="G0906"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \wj  \+w Let|strong="G0863"\+w* \+w her|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w alone|strong="G0863"\+w*: \+w against|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the day|strong="G2250"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1780"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w burying|strong="G1780"\+w* \+w hath she kept|strong="G5083"\+w* \+w this|strong="G0846"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w For|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w the poor|strong="G4434"\+w* \+w always|strong="G3842"\+w* \+w ye have|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w with|strong="G3326"\+w* \+w you|strong="G1438"\+w*; \+w but|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1691"\+w* \+w ye have|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w always|strong="G3842"\+w*.\wj*

¶ \w But|strong="G1161"\w* the chief \w priests|strong="G0749"\w* \w consulted|strong="G1011"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* they might \w put|strong="G0615"\w* \w Lazarus|strong="G2976"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* to \w death|strong="G0615"\w*;

\w Because|strong="G3754"\w* that by reason \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* of the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* went \w away|strong="G5217"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w believed|strong="G4100"\w* \w on|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

¶ On the next \w day|strong="G1887"\w* \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w people|strong="G3793"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* were \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* the \w feast|strong="G1859"\w*, when they \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* was \w coming|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w*,

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, when he had \w found|strong="G2147"\w* a young \w ass|strong="G3678"\w*, \w sat|strong="G2523"\w* \w thereon|strong="G1909"\w*; \w as|strong="G2531"\w* it \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w written|strong="G1125"\w*,

\w Fear|strong="G5399"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w*, \w daughter|strong="G2364"\w* of \w Sion|strong="G4622"\w*: \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w King|strong="G0935"\w* \w cometh|strong="G2064"\w*, \w sitting|strong="G2521"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* an \w ass’s|strong="G3688"\w* \w colt|strong="G4454"\w*.

These \w things|strong="G5023"\w* \w understood|strong="G1097"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* at the \w first|strong="G4413"\w*: \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* was \w glorified|strong="G1392"\w*, \w then|strong="G5119"\w* remembered \w they|strong="G3415"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w* \w were|strong="G2258"\w* \w written|strong="G1125"\w* \w of|strong="G1909"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add that\add* they had \w done|strong="G4160"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

The \w people|strong="G3793"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* that \w was|strong="G5607"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* he \w called|strong="G5455"\w* \w Lazarus|strong="G2976"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* his \w grave|strong="G3419"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w raised|strong="G1453"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*, bare \w record|strong="G3140"\w*.

The \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w among|strong="G4314"\w* \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w*, Perceive \w ye|strong="G2334"\w* \w how|strong="G3754"\w* ye prevail \w nothing|strong="G3762"\w*? \w behold|strong="G1492"\w*, the \w world|strong="G2889"\w* is \w gone|strong="G0565"\w* \w after|strong="G3694"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G1161"\w* there \w were|strong="G2258"\w* \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w Greeks|strong="G1672"\w* \w among|strong="G1537"\w* them that came \w up|strong="G0305"\w* to \w worship|strong="G4352"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* the \w feast|strong="G1859"\w*:

\w Philip|strong="G5376"\w* \w cometh|strong="G2064"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w telleth|strong="G3004"\w* \w Andrew|strong="G0406"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* \w Andrew|strong="G0406"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Philip|strong="G5376"\w* \w tell|strong="G3004"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj  \+w The hour|strong="G5610"\+w* \+w is come|strong="G2064"\+w*, \+w that|strong="G2443"\+w* \+w the Son|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w of man|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w should be glorified|strong="G1392"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w Verily|strong="G0281"\+w*, \+w verily|strong="G0281"\+w*, \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w Except|strong="G1437"\+w* \+w a corn|strong="G2848"\+w* \+w of wheat|strong="G4621"\+w* \+w fall|strong="G4098"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the ground|strong="G1093"\+w* and \+w die|strong="G0599"\+w*, \+w it|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w abideth|strong="G3306"\+w* \+w alone|strong="G3441"\+w*: \+w but|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w if|strong="G1437"\+w* \+w it die|strong="G0599"\+w*, \+w it bringeth forth|strong="G5342"\+w* \+w much|strong="G4183"\+w* \+w fruit|strong="G2590"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w He that loveth|strong="G5368"\+w* \+w his|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w life|strong="G5590"\+w* \+w shall lose|strong="G0622"\+w* \+w it|strong="G0846"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w he that hateth|strong="G3404"\+w* \+w his|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w life|strong="G5590"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w this|strong="G5129"\+w* \+w world|strong="G2889"\+w* \+w shall keep|strong="G5442"\+w* \+w it|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w unto|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w life|strong="G2222"\+w* \+w eternal|strong="G0166"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w If|strong="G1437"\+w* \+w any man|strong="G5100"\+w* \+w serve|strong="G1247"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1698"\+w*, \+w let him follow|strong="G0190"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1698"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w where|strong="G3699"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w am|strong="G1510"\+w*, \+w there|strong="G1563"\+w* \+w shall|strong="G2071"\+w* \+w also|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w my|strong="G1699"\+w* \+w servant|strong="G1249"\+w* \+w be|strong="G2071"\+w*: \+w if|strong="G1437"\+w* \+w any man|strong="G5100"\+w* \+w serve|strong="G1247"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1698"\+w*, \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w will|strong="G5091"\+w* \+add my\+add* \+w Father|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w honour|strong="G5091"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w Now|strong="G3568"\+w* \+w is|strong="G5015"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w soul|strong="G5590"\+w* \+w troubled|strong="G5015"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w what|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w shall I say|strong="G2036"\+w*? \+w Father|strong="G3962"\+w*, \+w save|strong="G4982"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w* \+w from|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w this|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w hour|strong="G5610"\+w*: \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w for|strong="G1223"\+w* \+w this|strong="G5124"\+w* \+w cause|strong="G1223"\+w* \+w came I|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w unto|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w this|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w hour|strong="G5610"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w Father|strong="G3962"\+w*, \+w glorify|strong="G1392"\+w* \+w thy|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w name|strong="G3686"\+w*.\wj* \w Then|strong="G3767"\w* came \w there|strong="G2064"\w* a \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*, \add saying\add*, I \w have|strong="G1392"\w* \w both|strong="G2532"\w* \w glorified|strong="G1392"\w* \add it\add*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* will \w glorify|strong="G1392"\w* \add it\add* \w again|strong="G3825"\w*.

The \w people|strong="G3767"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3793"\w*, that stood \w by|strong="G2476"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \add it\add*, said \w that|strong="G3004"\w* \w it|strong="G1096"\w* \w thundered|strong="G1027"\w*: \w others|strong="G0243"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, An \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* \w spake|strong="G2980"\w* to \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \wj  \+w This|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w voice|strong="G5456"\+w* \+w came|strong="G1096"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w because|strong="G1223"\+w* \+w of me|strong="G1691"\+w*, \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w for|strong="G1223"\+w* \+w your|strong="G5209"\+w* \+w sakes|strong="G1223"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w Now|strong="G3568"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w the judgment|strong="G2920"\+w* \+w of|strong="G2889"\+w* \+w this|strong="G5127"\+w* \+w world|strong="G2889"\+w*: \+w now|strong="G3568"\+w* \+w shall|strong="G1544"\+w* \+w the prince|strong="G0758"\+w* \+w of|strong="G2889"\+w* \+w this|strong="G5127"\+w* \+w world|strong="G2889"\+w* \+w be cast|strong="G1544"\+w* \+w out|strong="G1854"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w And I|strong="G2504"\+w*, \+w if|strong="G1437"\+w* \+w I be lifted up|strong="G5312"\+w* \+w from|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w the earth|strong="G1093"\+w*, \+w will draw|strong="G1670"\+w* \+w all|strong="G3956"\+w* \+add men\+add* \+w unto|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1683"\+w*.\wj*
\w This|strong="G5124"\w* he \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, \w signifying|strong="G4591"\w* \w what|strong="G4169"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w* he \w should|strong="G3195"\w* \w die|strong="G0599"\w*.

The \w people|strong="G3793"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w We|strong="G2249"\w* have \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w out|strong="G1537"\w* of the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w abideth|strong="G3306"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w ever|strong="G0165"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w how|strong="G4459"\w* \w sayest|strong="G3004"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w*, The \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* of \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w must|strong="G1163"\w* be lifted \w up|strong="G5312"\w*? \w who|strong="G5101"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* of \w man|strong="G0444"\w*?

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Yet|strong="G2089"\+w* \+w a little|strong="G3398"\+w* \+w while|strong="G5550"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w the light|strong="G5457"\+w* \+w with|strong="G3326"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5216"\+w*. \+w Walk|strong="G4043"\+w* \+w while|strong="G2193"\+w* \+w ye have|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w the light|strong="G5457"\+w*, \+w lest|strong="G2443"\+w* \+w darkness|strong="G4653"\+w* \+w come upon|strong="G2638"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5209"\+w*: \+w for|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w he that walketh|strong="G4043"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w darkness|strong="G4653"\+w* \+w knoweth|strong="G1492"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w whither|strong="G4226"\+w* \+w he goeth|strong="G5217"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w While|strong="G2193"\+w* \+w ye have|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w light|strong="G5457"\+w*, \+w believe|strong="G4100"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the light|strong="G5457"\+w*, \+w that|strong="G2443"\+w* \+w ye may be|strong="G1096"\+w* \+w the children|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w of light|strong="G5457"\+w*.\wj* These \w things|strong="G5023"\w* \w spake|strong="G2980"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w departed|strong="G0565"\w*, and did hide \w himself|strong="G2928"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

¶ \w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w though|strong="G4160"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* had \w done|strong="G4160"\w* so \w many|strong="G5118"\w* \w miracles|strong="G4592"\w* \w before|strong="G1715"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, yet they \w believed|strong="G4100"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w on|strong="G1519"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*:

\w That|strong="G2443"\w* the \w saying|strong="G3056"\w* of \w Esaias|strong="G2268"\w* the \w prophet|strong="G4396"\w* might be \w fulfilled|strong="G4137"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* he \w spake|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w who|strong="G5101"\w* hath \w believed|strong="G4100"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w report|strong="G0189"\w*? \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w whom|strong="G5101"\w* \w hath|strong="G0601"\w* the \w arm|strong="G1023"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* been \w revealed|strong="G0601"\w*?
